table.name: accounts
table.description: Storage of passwords for different types of accounts

table.name: actions
table.description: List of logable actions: name (for php), descr (human-readable)

table.name: apsContexts
table.description: Information about hosting panel contexts used for APS applications

table.name: apsContextsApplications
table.description: Set of shared APS controller application resources IDs linked to hosting contexts

table.name: apsResources
table.description: Information about hosting panel resources used for APS applications

table.name: apsResourcesParameters
table.description: Runtime parameters of hosting panel resources used for APS applications

table.name: BackupExcludeFiles
table.description: List of files to exclude from backup

table.name: CliCallsStat
table.description: Statistics of cli calls (plesk user utilities, i.e. bin)

table.name: clients
table.description: Clients (but in fact admin, resellers, customers)

table.name: DatabaseUserRemoteAccessRules
table.description: Rules for access to database remotely

table.name: DomainServices
table.description: Services available on domain. Service parameters are stored in Parameters

table.name: forwarding
table.description: Destination URLs for standard forwarding and frame forwarding

table.name: hotlink_friends
table.description: Information about friends for protected domains (used on Windows only)

table.name: hotlink_prot
table.description: Information about hotlink protectioned domains (used on Windows only)

table.name: IpAddressesCollections
table.description: List of IP addresses in collection

table.name: MailMessagesStat
table.description: Statistics of sent messages (collected on Windows only)

table.name: PanelNotificationTemplateSettings
table.description: List of notification template customized settings

field.name: value
field.value: This address no longer accepts mail.

table.name: SessionContexts
table.description: JSON encoded data stored in session

table.name: smtp_poplocks
table.description: Used for SMTP poplocks and IP white list for relay

table.name: TraceFailedRequestsProviderAreas
table.description: Stores provider areas for a IIS failed requests

table.name: TraceFailedRequestsProviders
table.description: Stores possible providers of IIS failed requests

table.name: TraceFailedRequestsRules
table.description: List of rules for a IIS failed requests

table.name: smb_apsPackagesCategories
table.description: Links to categories of installed applications

table.name: smb_apsBundleFilters
table.description: Filter of APS application for service plan

table.name: smb_roleServicePermissions
table.description: Permissions of role to access service

table.name: smb_userServicePermissions
table.description: Permissions of user to access service

table.name: smb_servicePermissionAccounts
table.description: Permissions of user to access service
